name: Vereniging Nederlands Kalkzandsteenplatform
goal: De belangenbehartiging van de Nederlandse kalkzandsteenindustrie en haar toeleveranciers in nationaal en internationaal verband m.n. t.a.v. milieu, arbo/ veiligheid, digitalisering en kwaliteit.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Normalisatie
CPR
Energy
Circulair Economy
Waste
Environment
Digitization

VNK focusses on environment, work safety, digitization and quality.
